abstract: At the SuperReturn International conference, executives said that they were returning capital to investors, rather than taking on risky investments.
snippet: At the SuperReturn International conference, executives said that they were returning capital to investors, rather than taking on risky investments.
lead_paragraph: BERLIN — Private equity firms are shying away from overly risky investments as the price of potential acquisitions remains high, a panel of industry leaders said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Private Equity Leaders Focusing on Returning Money to Investors
